## Shadow Parts

| Part        | Description                                                |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"base"`    | The component's wrapper that holds the prefix and message. |
| `"message"` | The '<div>' tag element that acts as message container.    |
| `"prefix"`  | The '<div>' tag element that acts as prefix container.     |
